file.name: test_import2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
components:
  schemas:
    Import2Pet:
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'test_import.yaml#/components/schemas/ImportNewPet'
        - required:
          - id
          properties:
            id:
              type: integer
              format: int64

    Import2Error:
      $ref: 'test_import.yaml#/components/schemas/ImportError'
